https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fXasAntzLhBjqGIifQZUjPP319F.jpg Playboy millionaire, Tony Canoni, is caught between a satanic vampire cult and the Yakuza, but taking on undead blood suckers and the Japanese mafia isn't as hard as studying for his GED test at Night School. Based on a true story. Except the mafia part. We all know that there are no such things as the "Japanese". Bite School
